软件包 org.opengoss.core

Core plugin of OpenCore SOA Platform to support Ioc and ExtensionPoint based on OSGi.

请参见：
          描述

接口摘要
IExtensionRegistry ExtensionPoint and extension registry.
IInitializable A service that need to be initialized and destroyed should implement this interface.
INetworkServiceRegistry Network level registry.
IPluginContext A plugin's execution context that is used by the plugin to interact with the OSGi and OpenCore framework.
IPluginContextAware Interface implemented by the service that wants to know its plugin context.
IPluginServiceRegistry The plugin services registry.
IRegistry Interface of hierachical registry.
IServiceRegistry Read-only service registry.
IStartable A service that could be be started or stopped should implement this interface.
 

类摘要
PluginActivator Plugin activator.
PluginContext Plugin context.
Registry A Hierachical registry.
UID UID is the abbreviation of Universal Identifier that comply with URN rules.
 

异常摘要
 

软件包 org.opengoss.core 的描述

Core plugin of OpenCore SOA Platform to support Ioc and ExtensionPoint based on OSGi.

Core Plugin Offers:

  • Plugin level IoC: property injection, constructor injection
  • ExtensionPoint and Extension
  • Parse the "META-INF/plugin.xml", inject dependecies between services and bind the extentionPoint and extentions.

Plugins built on OpenCore SOA platform should:
  • Configure a "META-INF/plugin.xml" file
  • Code an activator class that extends PluginActivator.
